thread.title: Booked another stay before I left!
thread.title_full: Booked another stay before I left! - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SherylD74604
title: Booked another stay before I left!
text: This hotel is a wonderful place to stay while visiting NYC. Great location right off of Times Square. The staff are so friendly and helpful, by the end of your stay you feel like you know them well. Rooms are comfortable, small but not cramped. Bathroom and room were very clean. After a morning of shopping in the cold you can enjoy afternoon snacks and wine fireside in the cozy lounge area. I've already booked another stay!
